title: Green Mix - Dagu Rd
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Fusion
description: 绿米, at 上海市静安区大沽路432号, is a health food eatery and eco concept store; established 2013 as Awakening and rebranded in 2014. Serves vegan meals, salads, and smoothies. Retail merchandise promotes a cruelty-free, and eco-friendly lifestyle, and includes clothing, re-purposed home furnishings, as well as organic health products and food. Has Wi-fi.
